txt.en: 'Well, you are here in Eorlsmead right now! Stangard was built at the location of the war-camp Eorl established when he came south. Now, that was hundreds of years ago, but we have not forgotten.\n\n'This is an outpost of Rohan; you will find no women or children here. The men at this outpost have given the King reason to send them hither. Such reasons are varied, but they are also private.'
